gurmukhi: Awau ky bFeIAw eyk nwm ky jpeIAw Aaur kwm ky kreIAw Cof Aaur kaun iDAweIAY ]4]43]
transliteration: Aau Ke Badhaeeaa Ek Naam Ke Japaeeaa Aur Kaam Ke Karaeeaa Chhodh Aur Kaoun Dhiaaeeai||4||43||
translation: When should we meditate upon forsaking the Lord who prolongs the age of our life, who causes the Name to be repeated and all other works to be done?4.43.

gurmukhi: kwm ko kuinMdw KYr KUbI ko idihMdw gj gwjI ko gijMdw su kuinMdw kY bqweIAY ]
transliteration: Kaam Ko Kounindaa Khair Khoobiko Dihindaa Gad Gadjiko Gadindaa Su Kounindaa Kai Bataaeeai||
translation: He is called the creator, who completes all the errands, who gives the comfort and honour and who is the destroyer of warriors stout like elephants.

gurmukhi: cwm ky cilMdw Gwau Gwm qy bicMdw CqR CYnI ky CilMdw so idihMdw kY mnweIAY ]
transliteration: Chaam Ke Chalindaa Ghaau Ghaam Te Bachindaa Chhatra Chhainike Chhalindaa So Dihindaa Kai Manaaeeai||
translation: He is the wielder of bow, the Protector from all types of afflictions, Deceiver of the universal monarchs and Donor of everything without asking. He should be worshipped with diligence.

gurmukhi: jr ko idihMdw jwn mwn ko jinMdw joq jyb ko gijMdw jwn mwn jwn gweIAY ]
transliteration: Jar Ko Dihindaa Jaan Maan Ko Janindaa Jot Jeb Ko Gadindaa Jaan Maan Jaan Gadeeai||
translation: He is the Giver of wealth, Knower of life and honour and sorter of light and reputation; His Praises should be sung.

gurmukhi: doK ky dilMdw dIn dwns idhMdw doK durjn dilMdw iDAwie dUj kaun iDAweIAY ]5]44]
transliteration: Dokh Ke Dalindaa Deen Daanas Dihandaa Dokh Durjan Dalindaa Dhiaae Doojo Kaoun Dhiaaeeai||5||44||
translation: He is the effacer of blemishes, the giver of religious discipline and wisdom and the destroyer of vicious people. Whom else should we remember?5.44.

gurmukhi: swls sihMdw is`DqweI ko siDMdw AMg AMg mY AivMdw eyku eyko nwQ jwnIAY ]
transliteration: Saalas Sahindaa Siddhtaaiko Sadhindaa An An Mai Avindaa Ek(u) Eko Naath Jaaneeai||
translation: He endures everything peeacefully, He is engrossed in attainment of perfection, and He is the Only Lord who pervades in all limbs.

gurmukhi: kwlK kitMdw Kurwsn ko KuinMdw gRb gwPl gilMdw gol gMjK bKwnIAY ]
transliteration: Kaalakh Katindaa Khuraasaan Ko Khounindaa Grab Gadphal Gadindaa Gol Gadjakh Bakhaaneeai||
translation: He is the remover of darkness, the masher of the Pathans of Khorasan, perisher of the egoists and idlers, He is described as the destroyer of people full of vices.

gurmukhi: gwlb igrMdw jIq qyj ko idihMdw icq cwp ky cilMdw Cof Aaur kaun AwnIAY ]
transliteration: Gadlab Girandaa Jeet Tej Ko Dihindaa Chit Chaap Ke Chalindaa Chhodh Aur Kaoun Aaneeai||
translation: Whom should we worship except the Lord who is the Vanquisher of the Conquerors, giver of the Glory of conquest and who shoots the miraculous arrows from His bow.

gurmukhi: s`qqw idhMdw s`qqweI ko suiKMdw krm kwm ko kuinMdw Cof dUjw kaun mwnIAY ]6]45]
transliteration: Satta-taa Dihandaa Satt-taaiko Soukhindaa Karam Kaam Ko Kounindaa Chhodh Doojaa Kaoun Maaneeai||6||45||
translation: Whom else should we adore except him who is the Giver of Truth and Drier of falsehood and performer of Graceful acts?6.45.

gurmukhi: joq ko jigMdw jMg jwPrI idhMdw imqR mwrI ky milMdw pY kuinMdw kY bKwnIAY ]
transliteration: Jot Ko Jogindaa Jan Jaafaridihandaa Mitra Maari Ke Malindaa Pai Kounindaa Kai Bakhaaneeai||
translation: He is the Enlightener of the light, Giver of the victory in wars and is known as the Destroyer of the murderer of the friends.

gurmukhi: pwlk puinMdw prm pwrsI pRigMdw rMg rwg ky suinMdw pY AnMdw qyj mwnIAY ]
transliteration: Paalak Pounindaa Param Paarsipragindaa Ran Raag Ke Sounindaa Pai Anandaa Tej Maaneeai||
translation: He is the Sustainer, Giver of shelter, Far-sighted and knower, He is considered as listener of entertaining modes of music and full of blissful splendour.
